name: Couscous And Crab Salad With Cucumber Juice And Mint
recipeIngredient: 2 cups lump crab meat, picked over for shells
1 small red onion, halved and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place 3/4 cup of the cucumber juice in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the couscous, cover and remove from heat. Let stand for 5 minutes. Uncover and stir with a fork. Place in a bowl and set aside to cool.

Add the crab meat, cherry tomatoes, onion, mint and lemon and lime rinds and toss to coat. Toss in the remaining cucumber juice. Season with the salt and pepper. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
